title: Galaxy S22 series ships with Google Messages as the default messaging app in the US
content:
Samsung’s Galaxy S22 series launched at its Unpacked event last week, and it brought with it a surprising change. Google Messages now comes preloaded by default (complete with RCS support) over the company’s own Samsung Messages app in the US. The Galaxy S21 series introduced it as the default messaging app outside of Europe last

The post Galaxy S22 series ships with Google Messages as the default messaging app in the US appeared first on xda-developers.
